text: Events from the year 1855 in Russia ==Incumbents== * Monarch – Nicholas I (until March 2), Alexander II (after March 2) ==Events== * 2 March- Alexander II becomes tsar after the death of his father, Nicholas I. * * * * * * ==Births== * ==Deaths== * * * March 2 - Nicholas I of Russia, monarch (b. 1796) * July 15 - Euphrosinia Kolyupanovskaya, courtier (b. 1758) * ==References== 1855 in Russia Category:Years of the 19th century in the Russian Empire
title: 1855 in Russia
